Question
========

A regression analysis on the scores x and y of 30 individuals yields the regression equation ŷ = 10 + 6x. The standard error of the slope b is equal to 2. This means that the null hypothesis that x and y are independent can be rejected at

Answerlist
----------

* Α = 0.01
* Α = 0.05 but not at α = 0.01
* Α = 0.10 but not at α = 0.05

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Α = 0.01: Correct
* Α = 0.05 but not at α = 0.01: Incorrect
* Α = 0.10 but not at α = 0.05: Incorrect
